data.name: queryCliente_ListarTodo
data.value: SELECT cli.RutCliente AS Rut, cli.nombreCliente AS Nombre, cli.apellidosCliente AS Apellido, cli.fechaNacimiento AS Fecha, est.IdEstadoCivil AS IdEstado, est.descripcion AS EstadoCivil, sex.IdSexo AS IdSexo, sex.descripcion AS Sexo FROM cliente cli join estadoCivil est on cli.IdEstadoCivil=est.IdEstadoCivil join sexo sex on cli.IdSexo=sex.IdSexo ORDER BY cli.apellidosCliente, cli.NombreCliente

data.name: queryCliente_ListarPorRut
data.value: SELECT cli.RutCliente AS Rut, cli.nombreCliente AS Nombre, cli.apellidosCliente AS Apellido, cli.fechaNacimiento AS Fecha, est.IdEstadoCivil AS IdEstado, est.descripcion AS EstadoCivil, sex.IdSexo AS IdSexo, sex.descripcion AS Sexo FROM cliente cli join estadoCivil est on cli.IdEstadoCivil=est.IdEstadoCivil join sexo sex on cli.IdSexo=sex.IdSexo WHERE trim(lower(cli.RutCliente))=trim(lower(:RutCliente)) ORDER BY cli.apellidosCliente, cli.NombreCliente

data.name: queryEstadoCivil_ListarTodo
data.value: SELECT * FROM estadocivil ORDER BY idEstadoCivil

data.name: queryCliente_Eliminar
data.value: DELETE FROM cliente WHERE trim(lower(RutCliente))=trim(lower(:RutCliente))

data.name: queryCliente_ListarPorEstadoCivil
data.value: SELECT cli.RutCliente AS Rut, cli.nombreCliente AS Nombre, cli.apellidosCliente AS Apellido, cli.fechaNacimiento AS Fecha, est.IdEstadoCivil AS IdEstado, est.descripcion AS EstadoCivil, sex.IdSexo AS IdSexo, sex.descripcion AS Sexo FROM cliente cli join estadoCivil est on cli.IdEstadoCivil=est.IdEstadoCivil join sexo sex on cli.IdSexo=sex.IdSexo WHERE est.IdEstadoCivil=:idEstadoCivil ORDER BY cli.apellidosCliente, cli.NombreCliente

data.name: queryCliente_ListarPorSexo
data.value: SELECT cli.RutCliente AS Rut, cli.nombreCliente AS Nombre, cli.apellidosCliente AS Apellido, cli.fechaNacimiento AS Fecha, est.IdEstadoCivil AS IdEstado, est.descripcion AS EstadoCivil, sex.IdSexo AS IdSexo, sex.descripcion AS Sexo FROM cliente cli join estadoCivil est on cli.IdEstadoCivil=est.IdEstadoCivil join sexo sex on cli.IdSexo=sex.IdSexo WHERE sex.IdSexo=:idSexo ORDER BY cli.apellidosCliente, cli.NombreCliente

data.name: querySexo_ListarTodo
data.value: SELECT * FROM sexo ORDER BY idSexo

data.name: queryCliente_Actualizar
data.value: UPDATE cliente SET nombreCliente=:nombreCliente, apellidosCliente=:apellidosCliente, fechaNacimiento=:fechaNacimiento, idSexo=:idSexo, idEstadoCivil=:idEstadoCivil WHERE rutCliente=:rutCliente

data.name: queryCliente_Insertar
data.value: INSERT INTO cliente VALUES(:rutCliente, :nombreCliente, :apellidosCliente, :fechaNacimiento, :idSexo, :idEstadoCivil)

data.name: queryCliente_ListaContratos
data.value: SELECT C.numero AS Numero, to_char(C.FECHACONTRATO, 'dd/MM/yyyy') AS Inicio_contrato, to_char(C.FECHATERMINOCONTRATO, 'dd/MM/yyyy') AS Termino_contrato, C.idPlan AS idPlan, p.nombre AS Nombre_plan, to_char(FECHAINICIOVIGENCIA, 'dd/MM/yyyy') AS Inicio_vigencia, to_char(C.FECHAFINVIGENCIA, 'dd/MM/yyyy') AS Termino_vigencia, CASE WHEN C.VIGENTE=1 THEN 'Si' ELSE 'No' END AS Vigente, CASE WHEN C.DECLARACIONSALUD=1 THEN 'Si' ELSE 'No' END AS Declaracion_salud, p.PRIMABASE as Prima_base, C.PRIMAMENSUAL AS Prima_mensual, C.PRIMAANUAL AS Prima_Anual FROM contrato C join plan p on c.idPlan=p.idPlan WHERE trim(lower(rutcliente))=trim(lower(:rutCliente)) ORDER BY c.numero

data.name: queryContrato_ListarTodo
data.value: SELECT C.numero AS Numero, to_char(C.FECHACONTRATO, 'dd/MM/yyyy') AS Inicio_contrato, to_char(C.FECHATERMINOCONTRATO, 'dd/MM/yyyy') AS Termino_contrato, c.rutCliente as Rut, cl.nombreCliente||' '||cl.apellidosCliente as Cliente,tpc.idtipocontrato as IdTipoContrato, tpc.descripcion as TipoContrato, C.idPlan AS idPlan, p.nombre AS Nombre_plan, p.polizaActual AS Poliza, to_char(FECHAINICIOVIGENCIA, 'dd/MM/yyyy') AS Inicio_vigencia, to_char(C.FECHAFINVIGENCIA, 'dd/MM/yyyy') AS Termino_vigencia, CASE WHEN C.VIGENTE=1 THEN 'Si' ELSE 'No' END AS Vigente, CASE WHEN C.DECLARACIONSALUD=1 THEN 'Si' ELSE 'No' END AS Declaracion_salud, p.PRIMABASE as Prima_base, C.PRIMAMENSUAL AS Prima_mensual, C.PRIMAANUAL AS Prima_Anual, c.observaciones AS Observaciones FROM contrato C join plan p on c.idPlan=p.idPlan join cliente cl on c.rutCliente=cl.rutCliente join tipo_contrato tpc on p.idtipocontrato=tpc.idtipocontrato ORDER BY c.numero

data.name: queryContrato_ListarPorNumeroContrato
data.value: SELECT C.numero AS Numero, to_char(C.FECHACONTRATO, 'dd/MM/yyyy') AS Inicio_contrato, to_char(C.FECHATERMINOCONTRATO, 'dd/MM/yyyy') AS Termino_contrato, c.rutCliente as Rut, cl.nombreCliente||' '||cl.apellidosCliente as Cliente,tpc.idtipocontrato as IdTipoContrato, tpc.descripcion as TipoContrato, C.idPlan AS idPlan, p.nombre AS Nombre_plan, p.polizaActual AS Poliza, to_char(FECHAINICIOVIGENCIA, 'dd/MM/yyyy') AS Inicio_vigencia, to_char(C.FECHAFINVIGENCIA, 'dd/MM/yyyy') AS Termino_vigencia, CASE WHEN C.VIGENTE=1 THEN 'Si' ELSE 'No' END AS Vigente, CASE WHEN C.DECLARACIONSALUD=1 THEN 'Si' ELSE 'No' END AS Declaracion_salud, p.PRIMABASE as Prima_base, C.PRIMAMENSUAL AS Prima_mensual, C.PRIMAANUAL AS Prima_Anual, c.observaciones AS Observaciones FROM contrato C join plan p on c.idPlan=p.idPlan join cliente cl on c.rutCliente=cl.rutCliente join tipo_contrato tpc on p.idtipocontrato=tpc.idtipocontrato WHERE trim(lower(C.numero))=trim(lower(:numero)) ORDER BY c.numero

data.name: queryContrato_ListarPorNumeroDePoliza
data.value: SELECT C.numero AS Numero, to_char(C.FECHACONTRATO, 'dd/MM/yyyy') AS Inicio_contrato, to_char(C.FECHATERMINOCONTRATO, 'dd/MM/yyyy') AS Termino_contrato, c.rutCliente as Rut, cl.nombreCliente||' '||cl.apellidosCliente as Cliente,tpc.idtipocontrato as IdTipoContrato, tpc.descripcion as TipoContrato, C.idPlan AS idPlan, p.nombre AS Nombre_plan, p.polizaActual AS Poliza, to_char(FECHAINICIOVIGENCIA, 'dd/MM/yyyy') AS Inicio_vigencia, to_char(C.FECHAFINVIGENCIA, 'dd/MM/yyyy') AS Termino_vigencia, CASE WHEN C.VIGENTE=1 THEN 'Si' ELSE 'No' END AS Vigente, CASE WHEN C.DECLARACIONSALUD=1 THEN 'Si' ELSE 'No' END AS Declaracion_salud, p.PRIMABASE as Prima_base, C.PRIMAMENSUAL AS Prima_mensual, C.PRIMAANUAL AS Prima_Anual, c.observaciones AS Observaciones FROM contrato C join plan p on c.idPlan=p.idPlan join cliente cl on c.rutCliente=cl.rutCliente join tipo_contrato tpc on p.idtipocontrato=tpc.idtipocontrato WHERE trim(lower(p.PolizaActual))=trim(lower(:poliza)) ORDER BY c.numero

data.name: queryContrato_ListarPorRut
data.value: SELECT C.numero AS Numero, to_char(C.FECHACONTRATO, 'dd/MM/yyyy') AS Inicio_contrato, to_char(C.FECHATERMINOCONTRATO, 'dd/MM/yyyy') AS Termino_contrato, c.rutCliente as Rut, cl.nombreCliente||' '||cl.apellidosCliente as Cliente,tpc.idtipocontrato as IdTipoContrato, tpc.descripcion as TipoContrato, C.idPlan AS idPlan, p.nombre AS Nombre_plan, p.polizaActual AS Poliza, to_char(FECHAINICIOVIGENCIA, 'dd/MM/yyyy') AS Inicio_vigencia, to_char(C.FECHAFINVIGENCIA, 'dd/MM/yyyy') AS Termino_vigencia, CASE WHEN C.VIGENTE=1 THEN 'Si' ELSE 'No' END AS Vigente, CASE WHEN C.DECLARACIONSALUD=1 THEN 'Si' ELSE 'No' END AS Declaracion_salud, p.PRIMABASE as Prima_base, C.PRIMAMENSUAL AS Prima_mensual, C.PRIMAANUAL AS Prima_Anual, c.observaciones AS Observaciones FROM contrato C join plan p on c.idPlan=p.idPlan join cliente cl on c.rutCliente=cl.rutCliente join tipo_contrato tpc on p.idtipocontrato=tpc.idtipocontrato WHERE trim(lower(c.rutcliente))=trim(lower(:rutCliente)) ORDER BY c.numero

data.name: queryPlan_ListarTodo
data.value: SELECT * FROM plan ORDER BY idPlan

data.name: queryContrato_VerificarVigenciaDeContrato
data.value: SELECT C.numero AS Numero, to_char(C.FECHACONTRATO, 'dd/MM/yyyy') AS Inicio_contrato, to_char(C.FECHATERMINOCONTRATO, 'dd/MM/yyyy') AS Termino_contrato, c.rutCliente as Rut, cl.nombreCliente||' '||cl.apellidosCliente as Cliente, C.idPlan AS idPlan, p.nombre AS Nombre_plan, p.polizaActual AS Poliza, to_char(FECHAINICIOVIGENCIA, 'dd/MM/yyyy') AS Inicio_vigencia, to_char(C.FECHAFINVIGENCIA, 'dd/MM/yyyy') AS Termino_vigencia, CASE WHEN C.VIGENTE=1 THEN 'Si' ELSE 'No' END AS Vigente, CASE WHEN C.DECLARACIONSALUD=1 THEN 'Si' ELSE 'No' END AS Declaracion_salud, p.PRIMABASE as Prima_base, C.PRIMAMENSUAL AS Prima_mensual, C.PRIMAANUAL AS Prima_Anual, c.observaciones AS Observaciones FROM contrato C join plan p on c.idPlan=p.idPlan join cliente cl on c.rutCliente=cl.rutCliente WHERE trim(lower(C.rutCliente))=trim(lower(:rutCliente)) AND trim(lower(C.idPlan))=trim(lower(:idPlan)) AND C.VIGENTE=1 ORDER BY c.numero

data.name: queryContrato_Actualizar
data.value: UPDATE contrato SET fechaContrato=:fechaInicioContrato, fechaTerminoContrato=:fechaTerminoContrato, idPlan=:idPlan, fechaInicioVigencia=:inicioVigencia, fechaFinVigencia=:terminoVigencia, vigente=:vigente, declaracionSalud=:salud, primaAnual=:primaAnual, primaMensual=:primaMensual, observaciones=:observaciones WHERE numero=:numero AND rutCliente=:rutCliente

data.name: queryContrato_Insertar
data.value: INSERT INTO contrato VALUES (:numero, :fechaInicioContrato, :fechaTerminoContrato, :rutCliente, :idPlan, :inicioVigencia, :terminoVigencia, :vigente, :salud, :primaAnual, :primaMensual, :observaciones)

data.name: queryPlan_ListarPorTipoPlan
data.value: SELECT * FROM plan WHERE idTipoContrato=:idTipo ORDER BY idPlan

data.name: queryPlan_ListarTiposDePlan
data.value: SELECT * FROM tipo_contrato ORDER BY idTipoContrato

data.name: queryVehiculo_ListarMarcas
data.value: SELECT * FROM marca_vehiculo ORDER BY idMarca

data.name: queryVehiculo_ListarModelosPorMarca
data.value: SELECT mo.idmodelo, mo.descripcion FROM marcamodelo_vehiculo mv JOIN modelo_vehiculo mo ON mv.idModelo=mo.idModelo WHERE mv.idMarca=:pIdMarca ORDER BY mo.idModelo

data.name: queryComuna_ListarPorRegion
data.value: SELECT co.idComuna, co.nombreComuna FROM region_comuna rc JOIN comuna co ON rc.idComuna=co.idComuna WHERE rc.idRegion=:pIdRegion ORDER BY co.idComuna

data.name: queryRegion_ListarTodo
data.value: select * from region order by idRegion

data.name: queryVehiculo_BuscarPorNroContrato
data.value: SELECT veh.patente as Patente, mav.idmarca as IdMarca, mav.descripcion as Marca, mov.idmodelo as IdModelo, mov.descripcion as Modelo, veh.anho as AnoVehiculo FROM vehiculo veh JOIN modelo_vehiculo mov ON veh.idmodelo=mov.idmodelo JOIN marcamodelo_vehiculo mmv ON mov.idmodelo=mmv.idmodelo join marca_vehiculo mav on mmv.idmarca=mav.idmarca JOIN contrato_vehiculo cvh on veh.patente=cvh.patente WHERE cvh.numero=:pNroContrato

data.name: queryVivienda_BuscarPorNroContrato
data.value: SELECT viv.codigopostal as CodigoPostal, viv.anho as AnoVivienda, viv.direccion as Direccion, reg.idregion, reg.nombreregion as Region, com.idcomuna as IdComuna, com.nombrecomuna as Comuna, viv.valorInmueble as ValorVivienda, viv.valorContenido as ValorContenido FROM vivienda viv JOIN comuna COM ON viv.idcomuna=COM.idcomuna JOIN region_comuna reco ON COM.idcomuna=reco.idcomuna join region reg on reco.idregion=reg.idregion JOIN contrato_vivienda cvi on viv.codigopostal=cvi.codigopostal where cvi.numero=:pNroContrato

data.name: queryVehiculo_eliminaVehiculo
data.value: DELETE FROM vehiculo WHERE patente=:pPatente

data.name: queryVehiculo_Insertar
data.value: INSERT INTO vehiculo VALUES(:pPatente, :pIdModelo, :pAno)

data.name: queryVehiculo_QuitarRelacion
data.value: DELETE FROM contrato_vehiculo WHERE numero=:pNroContrato AND patente=:pPatente

data.name: queryVehiculo_RelacionarContratoVehiculo
data.value: INSERT INTO contrato_vehiculo VALUES (:pNroContrato, :pPatente)

data.name: queryVivienda_Agregar
data.value: INSERT INTO vivienda VALUES (:pCodigoPostal, :pAno, :pDireccion, :pValorInmueble, :pValorContenido, :pIdComuna)

data.name: queryVivienda_AgregarRelacion
data.value: INSERT INTO contrato_vivienda VALUES (:pNroContrato, :pCodigoPostal)

data.name: queryVivienda_QuitarRelacion
data.value: DELETE FROM contrato_vivienda WHERE numero=:pNroContrato AND codigopostal=:pCodigoPostal

data.name: queryVivienda_QuitarVivienda
data.value: DELETE FROM vivienda WHERE codigoPostal=:pCodigoPostal
